description: in microavia we create autonomous uav infrastructure. we develop all components of the system, both hardware and software: landing station, uav (frame, autopilot, etc.), unmanned traffic management (utm) system. the system connects together uavs, ground stations, external air traffic sources, 3-rd party utms and other data (like rtk gnss corrections, weather, aerial photo) and provides web based user interface for operators to manage uavs and ifrastructure. we are looking for lead go lang developer for developing backend for utm system. we are looking for you if you are: - fluent in go and good in networks - able to design and implement complex realtime network system from scratch - self-motivated, smart and creative even better if you: - use linux for work - have contributed a lot to open source - know c++, js (for integration with other components) - worked with geo data (aerial/satellite photo, landscape, gis data) - have experience with uavs we offer: - wide range of highly challenging development tasks - team of brilliant and talented people - relocation support - paid business trips to italy and other interesting places a few times a year - no tight deadlines, no over management, family-friendly work hours - a lot of space for your ideas
name: lead go developer
